title: Lagging in league
body: I've been lagging in league for the last few days. I was wondering if anyone else is experiencing this issue. it happens when mostly in team fights when people are using their abilities.

replies.body:
I have the same problem too ping spikes and the game its laggy and my pc its brand new and LOL its the only game i lag in and i dont even live in the USA or NA region i live in Greece and this is NOTE cool

it was fine and now this

RIOT YOU NEED TO FIX THE SERVERS

I'm pretty sure. I opened a ticket and have gotten one reply so far but they are trying to say that it's my pc (NOT). They havent been replying on the Help & Support and the Report a Bug section lately.
its been happening to a lot of us
Is riot aware of the issue?
